metadata.title: Upgrading to CDKTF Version 0.10
metadata.description: We changed how lists of computed attributes work to allow referencing the whole list

outlineItems.title: Upgrading to CDK for Terraform Version 0.10

pageHeading.title: Upgrading to CDK for Terraform Version 0.10

const layoutProps={};const MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components,...props}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...props,components:components,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`0.10 includes improvements to the provider code bindings, to allow referencing lists of computed attributes as a whole list instead of just individual items of that list.
We also shipped a lot of CLI improvements in 0.10, including support for multiple stacks in `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf deploy`),`, `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf output`),`, and `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf destroy`),`.`),mdx("h3",{"id":"remove-cdktf-synth-json-option"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#remove-cdktf-synth-json-option","aria-label":"remove cdktf synth json option permalink"},`\xbb`),`Remove `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"h3"},`cdktf synth --json`),` Option`),mdx("p",null,`PR: `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk/pull/1640"},`#1640`)),mdx("p",null,`If you are using `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf synth --json <stack-name>`),` to get the synthesized JSON configuration for your Stack, you will now need to run `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf synth && cat ./cdktf.out/stacks/<stack-name>/cdk.tf.json`),` instead. The `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`./cdktf.out`),` part is your output directory (set by `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`cdktf.json`),` or via the `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`--output`),` flag).`),mdx("h3",{"id":"model-complexcomputedlists-as-complexlists-and-computedobjects"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h3","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#model-complexcomputedlists-as-complexlists-and-computedobjects","aria-label":"model complexcomputedlists as complexlists and computedobjects permalink"},`\xbb`),`Model ComplexComputedLists as ComplexLists and ComputedObjects`),mdx("p",null,`PR: `,mdx("a",{parentName:"p","href":"https://github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk/pull/1499"},`#1499`)),mdx("p",null,`In an effort to streamline the interfaces of resources, computed attributes of the type list and set are now modeled as a separate `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`ComplexList`),` type instead of being a method that directly takes an index and returns an item. This change also did change the type of the index from `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`string`),` to `,mdx("inlineCode",{parentName:"p"},`number`),`.`),mdx("h4",{"id":"typescript"},mdx("a",{parentName:"h4","className":"__permalink-h","href":"#typescript","aria-label":"typescript permalink"},`\xbb`),`Typescript`),mdx("pre",{"className":"language-typescript"},mdx("code",{parentName:"pre","className":"language-typescript"},mdx("span",{parentName:"code","className":"token comment"},`// previously`),`

alertBanner.text: Terraform Cloud is now HCP Terraform
